title: BRIEF-Livent And E3 Metals Announce Joint Development Agreement To Advance Lithium Extraction Process And Technology
text:
BRIEF-Livent And E3 Metals Announce Joint Development Agreement To Advance Lithium Extraction Process And Technology

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 06:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Livent And E3 Metals Announce Joint Development Agreement To Advance Lithium Extraction Process And Technology Sept 18 (Reuters) - Livent Corp LTHM.N : * LIVENT AND E3 METALS ANNOUNCE JOINT DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT TO ADVANCE LITHIUM EXTRACTION PROCESS AND TECHNOLOGY * LIVENT CORP - WORK UNDER AGREEMENT WILL FOCUS ON E3 METALS' PETRO-LITHIUM BRINES LOCATED IN LEDUC FORMATION IN ALBERTA * LIVENT CORP - LIVENT WILL CONTRIBUTE ITS TECHNICAL EXPERTISE AND UP TO US$ 5.5 MILLION TO JOINT DEVELOPMENT PROJECT * LIVENT - ON COMPLETION OF PROJECT, SATISFACTION OF FUNDING, CAN TO CONVERT INVESTMENT INTO A 19.9% OWNERSHIP STAKE IN E3 METALS * LIVENT - ON COMPLETION OF PROJECT, SATISFACTION OF FUNDING, CAN APPOINT ONE MEMBER TO E3 METALS BOARD

BRIEF-Livent And E3 Metals Announce Joint Development Agreement To Advance Lithium Extraction Process And Technology
description: BRIEF-Livent And E3 Metals Announce Joint Development Agreement To Advance Lithium Extraction Process And Technology
